content: I've had great experiences with ThredUp, and I've also tried Poshmark and eBay. I think the key to finding hidden gems is to be patient and persistent in your search. You have to be willing to sift through a lot of items to find that one amazing deal. Also, it helps to have a clear idea of what you're looking for and to know your measurements and sizes. That way, you can quickly filter out items that won't fit or aren't what you're looking for.
